title: Split consumers by elasticity, price discriminate

content.question: In order for a firm to engage in price discrimi- nation, it must be

choices.label: able to separate consumers into different groups based on demand elasticities
producing in the inelastic portion of its demand curve to raise its price and increase total revenue
experiencing economies of scale in the relevant range of production

content.answer: able to separate consumers into different groups based on demand elasticities
